item.title: Tree needs pruning, 25th August
item.description:
A very large oak tree requires pruning. It is very leaf and acorn heavy. The acorns fall on the cars in the car park and also in our garden. The branches overhang part of the garden and we feel the roots have lifted paving slabs in our garden. Also concerned in high winds the branches could fall on our shed and fence causing damage. In Autumn the leaves fall and cover the garden. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping mattress etc, 25th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melville Gardens, Bowes, London

item.title: Broken fridge and wooden door dumped, 25th August
item.description:
What looks like a broken fridge alongside a wooden door and other misc items have been dumped on the pavement by the bins outside of 90 Richmond Road/The Duke Of Richmond pub. The door has been there for multiple weeks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flag up flagpole on roundabout, 25th August
item.description:
A large union jack has been tied to a lamppost on the roundabout. This is part of National Right-Wing campaign to raise flags around the country. It intimidates innocent people and should not be allowed to continue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
